protein.specific_function: Functions as an inhibitor of hair elongation by promoting progression from anagen, the growth phase of the hair follicle, into catagen the apoptosis-induced regression phase

reference.reference_text: Haub O, Drucker B, Goldfarb M: Expression of the murine fibroblast growth factor 5 gene in the adult central nervous system. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1990 Oct;87(20):8022-6.
